message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this represents a fair offer considering the significant return on investment you'll experience.

I appreciate the opportunity to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this price still reflects the product's value, but also takes into account my budget constraints. Would you be willing to consider this offer?

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,025,000. This offer reflects the true worth of the product while acknowledging your interest.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I still think we can find a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $975,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
